title: Execute Automated Test Pipeline
description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to run automated test pipelines so that I can ensure continuous integration quality.
soThat: I can ensure continuous integration quality
acceptanceCriteria: Given CI pipeline is configured, when triggered, then all automated tests execute successfully
Given test failures occur, when detected, then pipeline stops and reports clear error messages
Given tests pass, when completed, then deployment artifacts are generated and stored
